examples: He eventually found his niche in sports journalism.
Finalmente encontró su nicho en el periodismo deportivo.
They spotted a niche in the market, with no serious competition.
Detectaron un nicho en el mercado, sin competencia seria.
There's a niche for a small stylish car.
Hay un nicho para un automóvil pequeño y elegante.
The niche was just big enough to hold two small candles.
El nicho era lo suficientemente grande para contener dos velas pequeñas.
